issue.title: help.openai.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://help.openai.com/en](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fhelp.openai.com%2Fen) ### Comment > 오픈ai 헬프 센터에서 실시간 채팅 아이콘?을 > 애드가드가 차단합니다 > 때문에 실시간 채팅을 하려면 애드가드를 비활성화 해야 합니다 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/hdy4su2elts000o8csc8k0wcck0wskw4jsufktxpyw.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/jl3rgr57blwkoww0css084ow84k8kswfpe6gevsuq0.jpg?nc=1)

issue.title: www.motorcycle.com

issue.title: www.reddit.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.reddit.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.reddit.com%2F) ### Comment > Ads appear even after updating, shutting down and restarting AdGuard both at system and browser level. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/mekl4wpwmas400wkgc80kwow4kkkc8oaslqdw0hqbc.png?nc=1)
